node.altText: Increased cast speed affects how quickly you start channelling, but does not affect the number of fireballs per second.
node.description: Fireball becomes a channelled ability that rapidly spews fireballs from your hand, but rapidly drains your mana. You do not regenerate mana while channelling.
Fireball has increased cast speed and deals more damage for each extra projectile (multiplicative with other modifiers), but no longer fires extra projectiles.

Fireball costs no mana to cast and has increased damage for each extra projectile but no longer fires extra projectiles.

Removes all extra projectiles. Grants 15% increased damage for each projectile removed
